title: Increased Shulker Shells
description_short: Increase the maximum drop rate of Shulker shells
description: Add an additional chance for Shulkers to drop a maximum of 2 shells

features.label: Adds a second Shulker shell drop chance at the same drop rate as a single shell
Chance of dropping multiple shells increases with looting
Compatible with Minecraft 1.13 and up, last tested on Minecraft 1.20
